column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////So obviously
column2: my first visit was a little underwhelming. I went with the Hubbs to Snooze on Wednesday
column3: in an excited flurry to welcome them to Houston
column4: only to sorely find out that their true opening day was the next day and that they were closed to the public for a private event. Frustrated but determined to go somewhere "good" for breakfast
column5: I recommended Common Bond to the Hubbs (since he had never been there before). He agreed
